name: Goro Akechi Side Story: Wilting Justice [PROLOG!!!]
name_original: Goro Akechi Side Story: Wilting Justice [PROLOG!!!]
description:
Goro Akechi Side Story : Wilting Justice is a visual novel style fan project, that tells about Akechi's backstory and perspective. This project will be updated per chapters and not it's own whole game at once. This project also have it's own original sprites, visuals, and even ost, so please be patient because each release will took some time.

This project is still on it's prolog chapter, because of it it will be significantly short. Later chapters will be more longer than the prolog.
